item.title: Pac Tech Pulse: February 2026
item.description: This edition of PacTech Pulse covers February 2026.

item.title: Northern Connections: The European Arctic by 2035
item.description: As the rules-based order unravels in the European Arctic, experts examine three critical dimensions shaping the region by 2035: Europe's strategic vision, Greenland's future, and the role of military exercises in maintaining stability.
